message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $12,000 is a bit too high for me.  Would you consider $6,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it provides.
Hi Alice, I understand the value of the product, but $10,000 is still a bit too much for my budget. Could we meet in the middle at $8,000?
